wikipedia_page.main: Gary Liddell (27 August 1954 – 29 April 2015) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a striker. Active in both England and Scotland between 1972 and 1983, Liddell made over 150 career League appearances.

response: He is the son of the late Gary Liddell, a former Leeds United and Grimsby Town striker.Gary Liddell profile
